title: Gekichu!
description: Sayori has had bad luck with men all her life.  One day, she gets drunk and starts reminiscing her old clubmate, Kimika, when she moves in next door!  What sort of past do the two have and what sort of future will they have now that they've met again after all these years?

matches.title: Ojou-sama to Sono Shiyounin no Ojouji
I Tried Getting Back at My Sadist Girlfriend Who Hurt Her Hand and Can't Fight Back.
Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Unscripted Feelings and Their Several Accompanying Circumstances (Doujinshi)
